document.full_text: kostas kenteris and katerina thanou and their coach christos tzekos should be found guilty of giving false statements to authorities before the 2004 athens olympics in a doping probe, the athens prosecutor told a court on tuesday.
document.title: thanou and kenteris guilty, says prosecutor
lines_and_colors: kostas kenteris and katerina thanou and their coach christos tzekos should be found guilty of giving false statements to authorities before the 2004 athens olympics in a doping probe, the athens prosecutor told a court on tuesday.
